Text:
"failed to create the D3D9 device.."

my DirectX & GPU drivers are all up to date, so need a fix to this missing dll.

Edit :

..I found the solution, apparently it was a problem of the display, not a missing dll.

Open : *Instal Dir*EngineConfigBaseEngine.ini 
and search ResX and ResY and change it to your default display.

Thank you 13victime!
You are my hero.
Why is the store not working? can't unlock things nor buy them. Anyone?
